A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Subverting expectation is Rian Johnson's goal in this film and he seems to achieve this exceptionally. This may rub some people on the internet the wrong way\, but it is fresh and exciting (in my opinion\, at least). John Williams delivers\, as always. If you have issues with the plot\, at least you can't say anything about the visuals. This film looks spectacular! I believe that this film will stand the test of time - it may take a while for portions of the audience to catch up\, though.
